# Support libraries

This project uses libewf-20140608 to maintain compatibility with The Sleuth Kit. The source is included here as the upstream developer(s) keep moving it around.

## Documentation

Additional project information can be found on the BitCurator NLP wiki at https://github.com/BitCurator/bitcurator-nlp/wiki.
